goal.en: "Let student to access the sensor (or transducer) type and its principle for engineering monitoring purpose, also the correlated data acquisition and signal processing as fundamental requirement, including the operation of common software and hardware."
goal.ch: 本課程主要透過對於目前工程與環境監測需求，從基礎監測元件致動原理，至資料擷取與訊號分析、硬體整合、IT應用，以及案例分析等，企圖使各位同學能理解現場工程與環境監測作為，並可嘗試進行監測規劃與實作，契合實務應用。

content.en:
"1. Introduction (Week 1)
2. Principle of monitoring sensor and transducer (Week 2~4)
(1). Sensor and transducer type
(2). Structural, Geotechnical, Geo-environmental, Hydrological target
3. Data acquisition and signal processing (Week 5~7)
(1). A/D conversion principle
(2). Discrete signal processing
4. Monitoring system Integrate & setup (Week 9~12)
(1). Hardware integration (including Arduino)
(2). Visual Basic type programming
(3). Labview Basics and Intermediate
5. Applications of Information technology (IT) (Week 13~14)
(1). Web development
(2). Middleware
(3). Networks
(4). Wireless Sensor Network (WSN)
(5). Internet of Things (IOT)
6. Case study (Week 15~16)
Including Structural, Geotechnical, Geo-environmental, Hydrological applications."
